amendment.description: To add a provision relating to secondary use applications of electric vehicle batteries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3290 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2150) To add a provision relating to secondary use applications of electric vehicle batteries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3290 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3290 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 2953.
